content:
VerticalAlignment Enum

Definition

Specifies the vertical alignment for visual style elements with a fixed size.

In this Article

public enum VerticalAlignment
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
VerticalAlignment

Remarks

The VerticalAlignment values represent the return values of the GetEnumValue method when it is called with an argument value of System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty.

Fields

Bottom

The element is aligned to the bottom.
Center

The element is centered vertically.
Top

The element is aligned to the top.
